reqs: Pre-reqs: Either (a) a score of 80% or higher in one of MATH 256, MATH 257, MATH 316 or (b) MATH 400.
description: Green's functions for partial differential equations. Calculus of variations. Eigenfunction expansions. Rayleigh-Ritz and finite element methods. See Faculty of Science credit exclusion list: http://www.calendar.ubc.ca/vancouver/index.cfm?tree=12,215,410,414.
